title: ICYMI - Jon Stewart on Confederate Statue Removal, the Coronavirus Pandemic & "Irresistible"
itunes:title: ICYMI - Jon Stewart on Confederate Statue Removal, the Coronavirus Pandemic & "Irresistible"
description:
Jon Stewart gives his take on protesters taking down Confederate statues, the politicization of the COVID-19 crisis and his movie "Irresistible," which he wrote and directed.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
